price: (Ne u thamë atyre:) “Ky është ndëshkimi, provojeni atë. Dënimi i zjarrit i pret mohuesit”.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمۡ فَذُوقُوهُ وَأَنَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: dhālikum fadhūqūhu wa-anna lil'kāfirīna ʿadhāba al-nāri
